Steps.Message: Update at 00:25 - We can now confirm that a fault on an underground cable in the Windmill Road area is causing our substation safety equipment to operate. Although we know what's causing your power cut, we still need to locate the fault. To do this we're sending a specialist team, once they have arrived and fully assessed the amount of work required we may need to advise a new estimated timeframe for the repair. If you would like more information about this type of fault; here's a short video https://bit.ly/2ScxQDZ.

We became aware of a power cut at 22:33. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing
